item.description:
WBOA has put together yet another great evening social event. This less structured format allows you to connect with other members on a more personal level, as well as enjoy a great meal prepared by Carmelina's.

$26 includes your salad, entree, dessert, coffee, tea, or soft drink, as well as tax and tip.

5:30 Cash Bar
6:30 Sit Down Dinner

Please RSVP by December 7 with your meal selection. Carmelina's is happy to work with people with special dietary needs. Please send us a note if you have any food sensitivities that we can help to accommodate.

Menu

House Salad - Organic Mesclun greens, carrots, olives, red onion, cherry tomatoes and fresh Feta cheese, with your choice of our house-made Balsamic Vinaigrette or Gorgonzola dressing

Entrée Choices

Summer Risotto - A satisfying medley of Arborio risotto tossed with fresh Hadley asparagus, pancetta (optional), and wild mushrooms, topped with grated fresh Parmigiano

Chicken Piccata – Sautéed Chicken Breasts finished with a delicious preparation combining white wine, lemon, butter and capers served with Angel Hair Pasta

Spaghetti Carbonara - Made the old-fashioned way. A simple preparation of spaghetti, pancetta, Parmigiano, egg and cracked pepper, served in the traditional style without cream

Chicken Marsala –Sautéed Chicken Breasts finished with a wonderful preparation of sautéed oyster mushrooms in a sweet Marsala wine sauce served with Angel Hair Pasta

The Original Crazy Alfredo - on the menu since 1985, chicken, sausage, roasted red peppers and fettuccine in a spicy Alfredo sauce

Fettuccini Alfredo - A traditional preparation of cream, butter, Parmigiano and nutmeg tossed with fettuccini
Fettuccini Alfredo with Broccoli – Above preparation and broccoli

Shrimp Scampi - Shrimp sautéed with garlic, capers, white wine, lemon, artichokes, and sweet butter

Angel Hair Puttanesca - A spicy tomato sauce with anchovies (or not), capers, olives, white wine and basil tossed with angel hair pasta

La Palermitana - Sicilian soul food. Rapi greens, sun-dried tomatoes, garlic, pine nuts, golden raisins, and angel hair pasta

Linguine Clams or Mussels - Choice of fresh littleneck clams or fresh mussels, served with your choice of red sauce, or white wine and garlic sauce with linguini

Brasato - A slowly braised short rib with aromatics, red wine and sweet tomato, served with Pasta

Chicken Parmigiano - Simply prepared boneless chicken breast baked with our tasty marinara sauce and Parmigiano, served with Penne Pomodoro


Choice of Desserts
Tiramisu - Espresso and brandy soaked ladyfingers, layered with whipped mascarpone, and chocolate
Or
Cannoli - Crunchy pastry shell filled with sweet ricotta and chocolate chips

Beverages Included
Choice of Coffee, Tea or Soft Drinks

Beverages Available
Beer, Wine and Cocktails available for purchase
item.name: December Evening Social Event- Carmelina's on the Common
